params.amounts: The amount of the ERC1155 tokens
params.data: packed params to pass to the receiver as extra information*
params.ids: The ID of the ERC1155 token
params.to: The address which will receive the ERC1155 tokens
params.token: The address of the airdropped token

params.amount: The amount of the ERC20 token*
params.to: The address which will receive ERC20 token
params.token: The address of the airdropped token

params.ids: The ID of the ERC721 token*
params.to: The address which will receive the ERC721 token
params.token: The address of the airdropped token

emergencyTokenTransfer(address,address,u.details: transfer ERC20 from the utility contract, for ERC20 recovery in case of stuck tokens due direct transfers to the contract address.

flashClaim(address,uint256[],bytes).details: IMPORTANT There are security concerns for developers of flash loan receiver contracts that must be carefully considered

params.loanIds: The ID of loan being flash-borrowed
params.params: packed params to pass to the receiver as extra information*
params.receiverAddress: The address of the contract receiving the funds, implementing IFlashClaimReceiver interface

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Pause pool for emergency case, can only be called by emergency admin.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Unpause pool for emergency case, can only be called by emergency admin.

cancelAllBorrowOffersForSender(uint256).notice: Cancel all pending offers for a sender

claimERC1155Airdrop(address,address,uint.notice: Claim the ERC1155 token which has been airdropped to the loan contract

claimERC20Airdrop(address,address,uint25.notice: Claim the ERC20 token which has been airdropped to the loan contract

claimERC721Airdrop(address,address,uint2.notice: Claim the ERC721 token which has been airdropped to the loan contract

flashClaim(address,uint256[],bytes).notice: Allows smart contracts to access the collateralized NFT within one transaction, as long as the amount taken plus a fee is returned

foreclose(uint256).notice: anyone can trigger but only OpenSkyLendNFT owner can receive collateral

repay(uint256).notice: Only OpenSkyBorrowNFT owner can repayOnly OpenSkyLendNFT owner can recieve the paymentThis function is not pausable for safety

repayETH(uint256).notice: Only OpenSkyBorrowNFT owner can repayOnly OpenSkyLendNFT owner can recieve the paymentThis function is not pausable for safety

takeBorrowOffer((uint256,address,uint256.notice: take an borrowing offer using ERC20 include WETH

takeBorrowOfferETH((uint256,address,uint.notice: Take a borrow offer. Only for WETH reserve.Consider using taker's oWETH balance first, then ETH if oWETH is not enoughBorrower will receive WETH
